Title: Chapter 18
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Kenneth Lin
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Sebastian Arcelus
Plot: Francis resorts to informal negotiations with a Chinese billionaire. Lucas takes extreme measures in use to reveal the vice president. Team Underwood gets a new member.
